reviewtext: The delivery was prompt, the item was packed well and the floppy disk drive was plug and play as advertised.  I simply plugged into my computer using the Windows 7 program and the drive self loaded the software which took approximately 1 minute.  It was ready to use.  I was able to transfer my pictures from the floppy disks to CD's enabling me to view my old pictures which I hadn't seen for a long while.  I would, at this point, recommend the Sabrent external floppy disk drive as I am very satisfied with the product.
